CustomField.description: This field is optional and is populated by the Section Builder tool. This field denotes whether a section configuration should return only unique records. When the value is set to true, the view generator will respect the setting and generate appropriate html markup. In a hierarchy of dependent section configurations, only a single record should have a true value to ensure proper markup is generated. The default value is false and will result in view generator creating markup that lists all returned records.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is optional and is populated by the Section Builder tool. This field denotes whether a tier should return only unique records. When the value is set to true, the generated html code will respect the setting.
CustomField.label: Unique
